title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3.12 - Protection of cargo
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3.12 - Protection of cargo

State Regulations

In the interest of the public safety, welfare, prosperity, health and peace, every licensed stevedore having the responsibility of
safeguarding waterborne freight, shall cause all cargo on the pier or other
waterfront terminal to be so protected from theft or pilferage as may be
reasonably necessary and appropriate for the particular
cargo. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
3.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
